work.base: New York, New York; formerly Avengers Mansion, New York City, New York; S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier.

connections.groupAffiliation: Mighty Avengers, Avengers, S.H.I.E.L.D.; partner of Redwing; formerly Heroes For Hire, partner of Captain America, Secret Avengers, S.H.I.E.L.D. Super-Agents (leader), Defenders, ally of Secret Warriors , Defenders for a Day
